mapper.select:
SELECT B.* , SUBSTR(B.CNTR_DTL_NO, 1, INSTR(B.CNTR_DTL_NO, '-', 1, 1)-1) AS CNTR_NO /* 계약번호 */ , SUBSTR(B.CNTR_DTL_NO, INSTR(B.CNTR_DTL_NO, '-', 1, 1)+1) AS CNTR_SN /* 계약d일련번호 */ , (SELECT PD_NM FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS WHERE PD_CD = B.PD_CD) || '/외'||B.CNT || '건' AS CNTR_INFO FROM ( SELECT A.CNTR_CRAL_TNO1 AS CNTR_CRAL_TNO1 , A.CNTR_CRAL_TNO2 AS CNTR_CRAL_TNO2 , A.CNTR_CRAL_TNO3 AS CNTR_CRAL_TNO3 , MAX(A.CST_NO) AS CST_NO , MAX(A.PD_CD) AS PD_CD , MAX(A.PRM_END_YM) AS PRM_END_YM -- 선납종료년월 , TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(REPLACE(MAX(A.PRM_END_YM), '-', ''), 'YYYYMM'), 1),'YYYY-MM') AS MMPM_YM -- 선납종료익월년월 , NVL(MAX(A.PRM_RE_APLC_YN),'N') AS PRM_RE_APLC_YN -- 선납재신청 , NVL(MAX(A.PRM_RE_APLC_YN),'N') AS ORG_PRM_RE_APLC_YN -- 선납재신청 /* 발송서식 전달 param */ , MAX(A.CST_KNM) AS CST_KNM /* 고객명 */ , TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(REPLACE(MAX(A.PRM_END_YM), '-', ''), 'YYYYMM'), +0),'MM') AS PRM_END_MM /* 선납종료월 */ , MAX(A.CNTR_NO) || '-' || MAX(A.CNTR_SN) AS CNTR_DTL_NO /* 계약상세번호 */ , TRIM(REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(BOTH ' ' FROM MAX(A.PD_NM)), '[ ]*$', '')) AS PD_NM /* 상품명 */ , CASE WHEN COUNT(*) >= 1 THEN (COUNT(*)-1) ELSE 0 END AS CNT /* 건수 */ , TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(REPLACE(MAX(A.PRM_END_YM), '-', ''), 'YYYYMM'), +1),'MM') AS CURR_MM /* 당월 */ , TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(REPLACE(MAX(A.PRM_END_YM), '-', ''), 'YYYYMM'), +2),'YYYY') AS POST_YY /* 익월년도 */ , TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(REPLACE(MAX(A.PRM_END_YM), '-', ''), 'YYYYMM'), +2),'MM') AS POST_MM /* 익월 */ FROM (
) A GROUP BY A.CST_NO, A.CNTR_CRAL_TNO1, A.CNTR_CRAL_TNO2, A.CNTR_CRAL_TNO3 HAVING MAX(A.PRM_END_YM) IS NOT NULL ) B
